attributes.action:
Change Mothering Sunday 2020 
To Sunday November 15th 2020
attributes.additional_details: Something to look forward to as families and for the economy. Especially hospitality
attributes.background:
Due to the current climate regarding coronavirus. Families will not be celebrating to together to traditionally love and adore their Mother's more than normal for one day.
So I propose that Mothering in the UK to be postponed until Sunday 15th November. A date we can look forward to.

rejection.details: The Government is not responsible for setting the date of Mothering Sunday.
